learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate high level interpersonal skills in written and oral communication, and in negotiation with internal and external stakeholders.
Critically analyse information and data to provide evidence-based recommendations for clients.
Demonstrate strategic planning and project management skills, including applied knowledge of the coordination, development, implementation and evaluation of projects or public health programs.
Apply time management skills to prioritise competing demands, adapt effectively to change, and complete tasks on time.
Demonstrate relationship skills by identifying, negotiating, and work effectively with clients, stakeholders and colleagues.
Understand and identify the role of various frameworks, guidelines and policies in addressing population health.
Critically reflect on personal skills, professional strengths and develop self-awareness for life-long learning.

assessments.task_description: Students set goals for the semester prior to week 3, and complete and submit a goal setting form. Students are to include the Team Charter as an Appendix.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: Students reflect on their progress to date, complete the Interim report form and submit for review by their Course Coordinator. Student are to attach the mid-point deliverable as an appendix.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: Deliverable 2 is comprised of a presentation and written report. This is a 20-minute multimodal presentation where students share with the client/stakeholder their final key deliverable and the accompanying written report.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: Students complete the Final Report Form with their final reflections around their goals and learning objectives.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.
